name: ideate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I ] to think of an idea or ideas: It is a great forum, where you can discuss, debate, ideate, and develop fresh new perspectives.
[ T ] to form an idea of a particular thing: They were asked to ideate a new system.
